Text: Re Gathering System PSA Cc acquisition Gerald CT PM To Steve nron Mark NRON cc Subject Gathering System PSA Is this being looked at as an ENA acquistion also or solely a Crescendo acquisition Forwarded by Gerald NemecHOUECT on PM Ken PM Please respond to kckrisa To Audrey ONeil Email Gerald R Nemec Email Mark Castiglione Email cc Subject Gathering System PSA I received the proposed PSA for the Wildhorse acquisition from Petrie Parkman today I have attached for everyones review We are required to send back to TBI with proposed changes with our proposal Mark would you please forward to those who need to see it besides Audrey and Gerald Thx Ken Krisa PSADOC

Gathering System PSAyou review the PSA on Crescendos behalf or is this something Teresa Bushman or outside counsel should review Forwarded by Steve PruettCorpEnron on PM Enron North America Corp From Mark Castiglione PM To Steve nron Scott NRON Don CT Arvel CT Christopher B nron Mark nron Tyrell nron cc Subject Gathering System PSA FYI Forwarded by Mark CastiglioneCorpEnron on PM Ken on PM Please respond to To Audrey ONeil Email Gerald R Nemec Email Mark Castiglione Email cc Subject Gathering System PSA I received the proposed PSA for the Wildhorse acquisition from Petrie Parkman today I have attached for everyones review We are required to send back to TBI with proposed changes with our proposal Mark would you please forward to those who need to see it besides Audrey and Gerald Thx Ken Krisa PSADOC

Re Gathering System PSAhas worked with Crescendo in addition to Craig Carver Despite Richard Sanders contacts reservations about Carver as a trial litigator he marked up and helped negotiate over PSAs for me over a year time frame and I would recommend him He turns things quickly as well Gerald CT PM To Steve NRON cc Subject Re Gathering System PSA Steve We will probably use outside counsel that has worked with Crescendo before to handle this from Crescendos perspective I will coordinate from ENAs perspective I am working with Teresa on this issue Steve NRON PM To Gerald CT cc Subject Gathering System PSA Can you review the PSA on Crescendos behalf or is this something Teresa Bushman or outside counsel should review Forwarded by Steve PruettCorpEnron on PM Enron North America Corp From Mark Castiglione PM To Steve nron Scott NRON Don CT Arvel CT Christopher B nron Mark nron Tyrell nron cc Subject Gathering System PSA FYI Forwarded by Mark CastiglioneCorpEnron on PM Ken on PM Please respond to To Audrey ONeil Email Gerald R Nemec Email Mark Castiglione Email cc Subject Gathering System PSA I received the proposed PSA for the Wildhorse acquisition from Petrie Parkman today I have attached for everyones review We are required to send back to TBI with proposed changes with our proposal Mark would you please forward to those who need to see it besides Audrey and Gerald Thx Ken Krisa PSADOC
